original_text: Kerioth and Bozrah. He will punish all the towns of Moab, near or far away. Kerioth and Bozrah. He will punish all the towns of Moab, near or far away. Kerioth and Bozrah.
korean_text: 그리욧과 보스라와 모압 땅 원근 모든 성읍에로다

sentences.original_text: He will punish all the towns of Moab,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모압의 모든 성읍을 벌하실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He will punish all the towns of Moab,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모압의 모든 성읍을 벌하실 것이다.
